trans-unit.source: Implements a File Transfer Protocol (FTP) client.
trans-unit.target: 實作檔案傳輸通訊協定 (FTP) 用戶端。

trans-unit.source: To obtain an instance of <xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest>, use the <xref:System.Net.WebRequest.Create%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要取得的執行個體<xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest>，使用<xref:System.Net.WebRequest.Create%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: You can also use the <xref:System.Net.WebClient> class to upload and download information from an FTP server.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以使用<xref:System.Net.WebClient>上傳和下載資訊從 FTP 伺服器的類別。

trans-unit.source: Using either of these approaches, when you specify a network resource that uses the FTP scheme (for example, `"ftp://contoso.com"`) the <xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest> class provides the ability to programmatically interact with FTP servers.
trans-unit.target: 使用任一種方法，當您指定使用 FTP 配置網路資源 (例如， `"ftp://contoso.com"`)<xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest>類別可讓您以程式設計的方式與 FTP 伺服器互動。

trans-unit.source: The URI may be relative or absolute.
trans-unit.target: URI 可能是相對或絕對。

trans-unit.source: If the URI is of the form `"ftp://contoso.com/%2fpath"` (%2f is an escaped '/'), then the URI is absolute, and the current directory is `/path`.
trans-unit.target: 如果 URI 的格式是`"ftp://contoso.com/%2fpath"`(%2f 是逸出 '/')、 URI 為絕對的然後和目前的目錄是`/path`。

trans-unit.source: If, however, the URI is of the form `"ftp://contoso.com/path"`, first the .NET Framework logs into the FTP server (using the user name and password set by the <xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.Credentials%2A> property), then the current directory is set to `<UserLoginDirectory>/path`.
trans-unit.target: 如果，不過，URI 的格式是`"ftp://contoso.com/path"`，.NET Framework 第一次登入 FTP 伺服器 (使用使用者名稱和密碼設定<xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.Credentials%2A>屬性)，則會設定目前的目錄`<UserLoginDirectory>/path`。

trans-unit.source: You must have a valid user name and password for the server or the server must allow anonymous logon.
trans-unit.target: 您必須擁有有效的使用者名稱和密碼的伺服器或伺服器必須允許匿名登入。

trans-unit.source: You can specify the credentials used to connect to the server by setting the <xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.Credentials%2A> property or you can include them in the <xref:System.Uri.UserInfo%2A> portion of the URI passed to the <xref:System.Net.WebRequest.Create%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 您可以指定用來設定連線到伺服器的認證<xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.Credentials%2A>屬性，或者您可以將其併入<xref:System.Uri.UserInfo%2A>URI 部分傳遞至<xref:System.Net.WebRequest.Create%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: If you include <xref:System.Uri.UserInfo%2A> information in the URI, the <xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.Credentials%2A> property is set to a new network credential with the specified user name and password information.
trans-unit.target: 如果您包含<xref:System.Uri.UserInfo%2A>URI 中的資訊<xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.Credentials%2A>屬性設定為新的網路認證，而且指定的使用者名稱和密碼資訊。

trans-unit.source: Unless the <xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.EnableSsl%2A> property is `true`, all data and commands, including your user name and password information, are sent to the server in clear text.
trans-unit.target: 除非<xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.EnableSsl%2A>屬性是`true`，所有資料和命令，包括您的使用者名稱和密碼資訊，都傳送到伺服器以純文字。

trans-unit.source: Anyone monitoring network traffic can view your credentials and use them to connect to the server.
trans-unit.target: 監視網路流量的任何人都可以檢視您的認證，並使用它們來連接到伺服器。

trans-unit.source: If you are connecting to an FTP server that requires credentials and supports Secure Sockets Layer (SSL), you should set <xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.EnableSsl%2A> to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果您要連接到 FTP 伺服器需要認證且支援安全通訊端層 (SSL)，您應該設定<xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.EnableSsl%2A>至`true`。

trans-unit.source: You must have <xref:System.Net.WebPermission> to access the FTP resource; otherwise, a <xref:System.Security.SecurityException> exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 您必須擁有<xref:System.Net.WebPermission>存取 FTP 資源; 否則<xref:System.Security.SecurityException>擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: Specify the FTP command to send to the server by setting the <xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.Method%2A> property to a value defined in the <xref:System.Net.WebRequestMethods.Ftp> structure.
trans-unit.target: 指定要設定傳送到伺服器的 FTP 命令<xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.Method%2A>屬性中定義的值為<xref:System.Net.WebRequestMethods.Ftp>結構。

trans-unit.source: To transmit text data, change the <xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.UseBinary%2A> property from its default value (`true`) to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 若要傳送的文字資料，請變更<xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.UseBinary%2A>從其預設值的屬性 (`true`) 至`false`。

trans-unit.source: For details and restrictions, see <xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.Method%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊和限制，請參閱<xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.Method%2A>。

trans-unit.source: When using an <xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest> object to upload a file to a server, you must write the file content to the request stream obtained by calling the <xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.GetRequestStream%2A> method or its asynchronous counterparts, the <xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.BeginGetRequestStream%2A> and <xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.EndGetRequestStream%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 當使用<xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest>物件檔案上傳至伺服器，您必須將檔案內容寫入要求資料流取得藉由呼叫<xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.GetRequestStream%2A>方法或其非同步對應項目<xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.BeginGetRequestStream%2A>和<xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.EndGetRequestStream%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: You must write to the stream and close the stream before sending the request.
trans-unit.target: 您必須寫入資料流，並傳送要求之前關閉資料流。

trans-unit.source: Requests are sent to the server by calling the <xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.GetResponse%2A> method or its asynchronous counterparts, the <xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.BeginGetResponse%2A> and <xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.EndGetResponse%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 藉由呼叫要求傳送到伺服器<xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.GetResponse%2A>方法或其非同步對應項目<xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.BeginGetResponse%2A>和<xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.EndGetResponse%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: When the requested operation completes, an <xref:System.Net.FtpWebResponse> object is returned.
trans-unit.target: 要求的作業完成時，<xref:System.Net.FtpWebResponse>物件傳回。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.FtpWebResponse> object provides the status of the operation and any data downloaded from the server.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.FtpWebResponse>物件會提供狀態的作業以及從伺服器下載的任何資料。

trans-unit.source: You can set a time-out value for reading or writing to the server by using the <xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.ReadWriteTimeout%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 您可以設定的讀取或寫入使用的伺服器逾時值<xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.ReadWriteTimeout%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: If the time-out period is exceeded, the calling method throws a <xref:System.Net.WebException> with <xref:System.Net.WebExceptionStatus> set to <xref:System.Net.WebExceptionStatus.Timeout>.
trans-unit.target: 如果超過逾時期限時，呼叫的方法會擲回<xref:System.Net.WebException>與<xref:System.Net.WebExceptionStatus>設<xref:System.Net.WebExceptionStatus.Timeout>。

trans-unit.source: When downloading a file from an FTP server, if the command was successful, the contents of the requested file are available in the response object's stream.
trans-unit.target: 如果命令執行成功，請從 FTP 伺服器下載檔案，回應物件的資料流中是使用 要求檔案的內容。

trans-unit.source: You can access this stream by calling the <xref:System.Net.FtpWebResponse.GetResponseStream%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 您可以藉由呼叫來存取此資料流<xref:System.Net.FtpWebResponse.GetResponseStream%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Net.FtpWebResponse>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Net.FtpWebResponse>。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.Proxy%2A> property is set, either directly or in a configuration file, communications with the FTP server are made through the specified proxy.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.Proxy%2A>屬性設定，可能是直接或組態檔中，與 FTP 伺服器的通訊透過指定的 proxy。

trans-unit.source: If the specified proxy is an HTTP proxy, only the <xref:System.Net.WebRequestMethods.Ftp.DownloadFile>, <xref:System.Net.WebRequestMethods.Ftp.ListDirectory>, and <xref:System.Net.WebRequestMethods.Ftp.ListDirectoryDetails> commands are supported.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的 proxy，則 HTTP proxy，僅<xref:System.Net.WebRequestMethods.Ftp.DownloadFile>， <xref:System.Net.WebRequestMethods.Ftp.ListDirectory>，和<xref:System.Net.WebRequestMethods.Ftp.ListDirectoryDetails>支援命令。

trans-unit.source: Only downloaded binary content is cached; that is, content received using the <xref:System.Net.WebRequestMethods.Ftp.DownloadFile> command with the <xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.UseBinary%2A> property set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 僅限下載的二進位內容會快取。也就是使用接收內容<xref:System.Net.WebRequestMethods.Ftp.DownloadFile>命令搭配<xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.UseBinary%2A>屬性設定為`true`。

trans-unit.source: Multiple <xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest>s reuse existing connections, if possible.
trans-unit.target: 多個<xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest>s 盡可能重複使用現有的連接。

trans-unit.source: For more information about the FTP protocol, see RFC 959, "File Transfer Protocol," available at [http://www.rfc-editor.org/](http://www.ietf.org/rfc/rfc959.txt).
trans-unit.target: 如需 FTP 通訊協定的詳細資訊，請參閱 RFC 959，「 檔案傳輸通訊協定，「 位於[ http://www.rfc-editor.org/ ](http://www.ietf.org/rfc/rfc959.txt)。

trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何從 FTP 伺服器刪除檔案。

trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用非同步作業上, 傳檔案至 FTP 伺服器。

trans-unit.source: for accessing the resource referenced by this request.
trans-unit.target: 用來存取這項要求所參考的資源。

trans-unit.target: 關聯的列舉型別：<see cref="F:System.Net.NetworkAccess.Connect" />。

trans-unit.source: Terminates an asynchronous FTP operation.
trans-unit.target: 結束非同步 FTP 作業。

trans-unit.source: If there is no operation in progress, this method does nothing.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有任何作業正在進行中的，這個方法任何作用。

trans-unit.source: If a file transfer is in progress, this method terminates the transfer.
trans-unit.target: 如果檔案傳輸正在進行中，這個方法會結束此傳輸。

trans-unit.source: This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application.
trans-unit.target: 在應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會輸出追蹤資訊。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[網路追蹤.NET Framework 中](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how the user can terminate an asynchronous upload of a file from the local directory to the server.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範使用者可以如何終止非同步上傳到伺服器的檔案從本機目錄。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.AsyncCallback" /> delegate that references the method to invoke when the operation is complete.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.AsyncCallback" /> 委派，會於作業完成時參考要叫用的方法。

trans-unit.source: A user-defined object that contains information about the operation.
trans-unit.target: 使用者定義物件，包含作業的相關資訊。

trans-unit.source: This object is passed to the <c>callback</c> delegate when the operation completes.
trans-unit.target: 作業完成時，這個物件會傳遞給「回呼」<c></c>委派。

trans-unit.source: Begins asynchronously opening a request's content stream for writing.
trans-unit.target: 開始非同步開啟要求的內容資料流，以進行寫入。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" /> instance that indicates the status of the operation.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" /> 執行個體，指出作業的狀態。

trans-unit.source: You must complete the asynchronous operation by calling the <xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.EndGetRequestStream%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 您必須完成非同步作業，藉由呼叫<xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.EndGetRequestStream%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Typically, <xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.EndGetRequestStream%2A> is called by the method referenced by `callback`.
trans-unit.target: 一般而言，<xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.EndGetRequestStream%2A>所參考的方法呼叫`callback`。

trans-unit.source: To determine the state of the operation, check the properties in the <xref:System.IAsyncResult> object returned by this method.
trans-unit.target: 若要判斷作業的狀態，請查看內容中<xref:System.IAsyncResult>這個方法所傳回的物件。

trans-unit.source: This method does not block while waiting for the stream.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法不會封鎖等候資料流。

trans-unit.source: To block, call <xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.GetRequestStream%2A> in place of this method.
trans-unit.target: 若要封鎖，請呼叫<xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.GetRequestStream%2A>取代此方法。

trans-unit.source: For detailed information about using the asynchronous programming model, see [Calling Synchronous Methods Asynchronously](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/calling-synchronous-methods-asynchronously.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需使用非同步程式設計模型的詳細資訊，請參閱[呼叫同步方法以非同步方式](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/calling-synchronous-methods-asynchronously.md)。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md).

trans-unit.target: 對這個方法的上一個呼叫或 <see cref="M:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.GetRequestStream" /> 尚未完成。

trans-unit.target: 無法建立與 FTP 伺服器的連接。

trans-unit.source: This method generates network traffic.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會產生網路流量。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.AsyncCallback" /> delegate that references the method to invoke when the operation is complete.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.AsyncCallback" /> 委派，會於作業完成時參考要叫用的方法。

trans-unit.source: A user-defined object that contains information about the operation.
trans-unit.target: 使用者定義物件，包含作業的相關資訊。

trans-unit.source: This object is passed to the <c>callback</c> delegate when the operation completes.
trans-unit.target: 作業完成時，這個物件會傳遞給「回呼」<c></c>委派。

trans-unit.source: Begins sending a request and receiving a response from an FTP server asynchronously.
trans-unit.target: 開始以非同步的方式傳送要求，並且接收來自 FTP 伺服器的回應。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" /> instance that indicates the status of the operation.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" /> 執行個體，指出作業的狀態。

trans-unit.source: You must complete the asynchronous operation by calling the <xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.EndGetResponse%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 您必須完成非同步作業，藉由呼叫<xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.EndGetResponse%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Typically, <xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.EndGetResponse%2A> is called by the method referenced by `callback`.
trans-unit.target: 一般而言，<xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.EndGetResponse%2A>所參考的方法呼叫`callback`。

trans-unit.source: To determine the state of the operation, check the properties in the <xref:System.IAsyncResult> object returned by the <xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.BeginGetResponse%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要判斷作業的狀態，請查看內容中<xref:System.IAsyncResult>所傳回物件<xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.BeginGetResponse%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.Proxy%2A> property is set, either directly or in a configuration file, communications with the FTP server are made through the specified proxy.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.Proxy%2A>屬性設定，可能是直接或組態檔中，與 FTP 伺服器的通訊透過指定的 proxy。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.BeginGetResponse%2A> does not block while waiting for the response from the server.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.BeginGetResponse%2A> 不會封鎖在等候來自伺服器的回應時。

trans-unit.source: To block, call the <xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.GetResponse%2A> method in place of <xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.BeginGetResponse%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要封鎖，請呼叫<xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.GetResponse%2A>方法取代<xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.BeginGetResponse%2A>。

trans-unit.source: For more information about using the asynchronous programming model, see [Calling Synchronous Methods Asynchronously](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/calling-synchronous-methods-asynchronously.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關使用非同步程式設計模型的詳細資訊，請參閱[呼叫同步方法以非同步方式](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/calling-synchronous-methods-asynchronously.md)。

trans-unit.target: 在應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會輸出追蹤資訊。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[網路追蹤.NET Framework 中](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。

trans-unit.source: If a <xref:System.Net.WebException> is thrown, use the <xref:System.Net.WebException.Response%2A> and <xref:System.Net.WebException.Status%2A> properties of the exception to determine the response from the server.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Net.WebException>會擲回，使用<xref:System.Net.WebException.Response%2A>和<xref:System.Net.WebException.Status%2A>屬性來判斷伺服器的回應例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates ending an asynchronous operation to get a request's stream, and then starting a request to get the response.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範結束非同步作業以取得要求的資料流，並再啟動要求取得回應。

trans-unit.target: 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分<xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest>類別概觀。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="M:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.GetResponse" /> or <see cref="M:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.BeginGetResponse(System.AsyncCallback,System.Object)" /> has already been called for this instance.
trans-unit.target: 針對這個執行個體，已經呼叫 <see cref="M:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.GetResponse" /> 或 <see cref="M:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.BeginGetResponse(System.AsyncCallback,System.Object)" />。

trans-unit.source: This method generates network traffic.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會產生網路流量。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the certificates used for establishing an encrypted connection to the FTP server.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定用來建立與 FTP 伺服器之加密連接的憑證。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection" /> object that contains the client certificates.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection" /> 物件，包含用戶端憑證。

trans-unit.source: Client certificates are used to authenticate the client during the initial SSL connection negotiation.
trans-unit.target: 用戶端憑證用來驗證用戶端在起始 SSL 連線的交涉期間。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.EnableSsl%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.EnableSsl%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework caches SSL sessions as they are created and attempts to reuse a cached session for a new request, if possible.
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 建立時，會快取的 SSL 工作階段，並嘗試盡可能重複使用快取的工作階段為新的要求。

trans-unit.source: When attempting to reuse an SSL session, the .NET Framework uses the first element of <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.ClientCertificates%2A> (if there is one), or tries to reuse an anonymous session if <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.ClientCertificates%2A> is empty.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試重複使用的 SSL 工作階段，.NET Framework 會使用第一個項目<xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.ClientCertificates%2A>（如果有一個），或嘗試重複使用匿名的工作階段，如果<xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.ClientCertificates%2A>是空的。

trans-unit.source: The value specified for a set operation is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 為設定作業指定的值為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the connection group that contains the service point used to send the current request.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定連接群組的名稱，這個連接群組包含用來傳送目前要求的服務點。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> value that contains a connection group name.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.String" /> 值，包含連接群組名稱。

trans-unit.source: Connection groups associate a set of requests with a particular connection or set of connections.
trans-unit.target: 連線群組會要求一組關聯的特定連線或連線集。

trans-unit.source: The connections in a connection group can be reused only by requests originating in the same application domain, when the credentials on the request are the same and the request specifies the connection group name.
trans-unit.target: 可重複使用連接群組中的連接，只能由來自相同的應用程式定義域中，當要求的認證相同，而要求指定的連接群組名稱的要求。

trans-unit.source: When a request does not specify a connection group name, any existing connection to the requested server that is not associated with a connection group can be used.
trans-unit.target: 當要求未指定連接群組名稱時，就可以使用任何現有的連接，來要求所關聯的連接群組的伺服器。

trans-unit.source: When the credentials are not the same, the existing connection is closed and the new request must be reauthenticated.
trans-unit.target: 認證不相同時，現有的連接會關閉，而必須重新驗證新的要求。

trans-unit.source: Using connection groups can improve performance because this allows all of the requests for a user to reuse the connection authenticated with the user's credentials.
trans-unit.target: 使用連接群組可以改善效能，因為這可讓所有使用者重複使用已驗證使用者的認證與連線要求。

trans-unit.source: Changing the <xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.ConnectionGroupName%2A> property after calling the <xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.GetRequestStream%2A>, <xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.BeginGetRequestStream%2A>, <xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.GetResponse%2A>, or <xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.BeginGetResponse%2A> method causes an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> exception.
trans-unit.target: 變更<xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.ConnectionGroupName%2A>屬性之後呼叫<xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.GetRequestStream%2A>， <xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.BeginGetRequestStream%2A>， <xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.GetResponse%2A>，或<xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.BeginGetResponse%2A>方法會使<xref:System.InvalidOperationException>例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: The following code example retrieves the value of this property.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會擷取這個屬性的值。

trans-unit.source: A new value was specified for this property for a request that is already in progress.
trans-unit.target: 由於已經在進行的要求，已為這個屬性指定新的值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that is ignored by the <see cref="T:System.Net.FtpWebRequest" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="T:System.Net.FtpWebRequest" /> 類別忽略的值。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Int64" /> value that should be ignored.
trans-unit.target: 應忽略的 <see cref="T:System.Int64" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.ContentLength%2A> property is provided only for compatibility with other implementations of the <xref:System.Net.WebRequest> and <xref:System.Net.WebResponse> classes.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.ContentLength%2A>屬性僅供使用的其他實作相容性<xref:System.Net.WebRequest>和<xref:System.Net.WebResponse>類別。

trans-unit.source: There is no reason to use <xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.ContentLength%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 沒有理由来使用<xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.ContentLength%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a byte offset into the file being downloaded by this request.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定這個要求所下載之檔案的位元組位移。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Int64" /> instance that specifies the file offset, in bytes.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Int64" /> 執行個體，指定檔案位移 (以位元組為單位)。

trans-unit.source: The default value is zero.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是零。

trans-unit.source: Set the <xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.ContentOffset%2A> property when downloading a file from an FTP server.
trans-unit.target: 設定<xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.ContentOffset%2A>從 FTP 伺服器下載檔案時的屬性。

trans-unit.source: This offset indicates the position in the server's file that marks the start of the data to be downloaded.
trans-unit.target: 這個位移會指出伺服器的檔案中，將標示要下載資料的開始位置。

trans-unit.source: The offset is specified as the number of bytes from the start of the file; the offset of the first byte is zero.
trans-unit.target: 位移指定為 從檔案; 開頭的位元組數目第一個位元組的位移為零。

trans-unit.source: Setting <xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.ContentOffset%2A> causes the <xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest> to send a restart (`REST`) command to the server.
trans-unit.target: 設定<xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.ContentOffset%2A>導致<xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest>傳送重新啟動 (`REST`) 命令至伺服器。

trans-unit.source: This command is ignored by most FTP server implementations if you are uploading data to the server.
trans-unit.target: 如果您要將資料上傳到伺服器，則大多數的 FTP 伺服器實作會忽略這個命令。

trans-unit.source: Changing <xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.ContentOffset%2A> after calling the <xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.GetRequestStream%2A>, <xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.BeginGetRequestStream%2A>, <xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.GetResponse%2A>, or <xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.BeginGetResponse%2A> method causes an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> exception.
trans-unit.target: 變更<xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.ContentOffset%2A>之後呼叫<xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.GetRequestStream%2A>， <xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.BeginGetRequestStream%2A>， <xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.GetResponse%2A>，或<xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.BeginGetResponse%2A>方法會使<xref:System.InvalidOperationException>例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates downloading part of a file from a server and appending the downloaded data to a local file.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範從伺服器以及將下載的資料附加到本機檔案的下載檔案的一部分。

trans-unit.source: A new value was specified for this property for a request that is already in progress.
trans-unit.target: 由於已經在進行的要求，已為這個屬性指定新的值。

trans-unit.source: The value specified for this property is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的指定值小於零。

trans-unit.source: Always throws a <see cref="T:System.NotSupportedException" />.
trans-unit.target: 永遠擲回 <see cref="T:System.NotSupportedException" />。

trans-unit.source: Always throws a <see cref="T:System.NotSupportedException" />.
trans-unit.target: 永遠擲回 <see cref="T:System.NotSupportedException" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.ContentType%2A> property is provided only for compatibility with other implementations of the <xref:System.Net.WebRequest> and <xref:System.Net.WebResponse> classes.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.ContentType%2A>屬性僅供使用的其他實作相容性<xref:System.Net.WebRequest>和<xref:System.Net.WebResponse>類別。

trans-unit.source: There is no reason to use <xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.ContentType%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 沒有理由来使用<xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.ContentType%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Content type information is not supported for FTP.
trans-unit.target: FTP 不支援內容類型資訊。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the credentials used to communicate with the FTP server.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定用來與 FTP 伺服器通訊的認證。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Net.ICredentials" /> instance; otherwise, <see langword="null" /> if the property has not been set.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Net.ICredentials" /> 執行個體；如果屬性尚未設定，則為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: You are not required to specify credentials when connecting using anonymous logon.
trans-unit.target: 您不需要使用匿名登入連接時指定的認證。

trans-unit.source: You must set the <xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.Credentials%2A> property by using a credential of type <xref:System.Net.NetworkCredential>; this ensures that the user name and password can be read and sent to the server.
trans-unit.target: 您必須設定<xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.Credentials%2A>屬性使用的認證類型的<xref:System.Net.NetworkCredential>; 這可確保該使用者名稱和密碼可以讀取及傳送至伺服器。

trans-unit.source: Credentials information is not encrypted when transmitted to the server unless the <xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.EnableSsl%2A> property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 認證資訊時不會加密傳送到伺服器，除非<xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.EnableSsl%2A>屬性設定為`true`。

trans-unit.source: Changing <xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.Credentials%2A> after calling the <xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.GetRequestStream%2A>, <xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.BeginGetRequestStream%2A>, <xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.GetResponse%2A>, or <xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.BeginGetResponse%2A> method causes an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> exception.
trans-unit.target: 變更<xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.Credentials%2A>之後呼叫<xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.GetRequestStream%2A>， <xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.BeginGetRequestStream%2A>， <xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.GetResponse%2A>，或<xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.BeginGetResponse%2A>方法會使<xref:System.InvalidOperationException>例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: The following code example retrieves the value of this property and uses it to display the user name.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會擷取這個屬性的值，並用它來顯示使用者名稱。

trans-unit.source: The value specified for a set operation is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 為設定作業指定的值為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Net.ICredentials" /> of a type other than <see cref="T:System.Net.NetworkCredential" /> was specified for a set operation.
trans-unit.target: 為設定作業，指定 <see cref="T:System.Net.ICredentials" /> 型別以外的 <see cref="T:System.Net.NetworkCredential" />。

trans-unit.source: A new value was specified for this property for a request that is already in progress.
trans-unit.target: 由於已經在進行的要求，已為這個屬性指定新的值。

trans-unit.source: Defines the default cache policy for all FTP requests.
trans-unit.target: 為所有 FTP 要求，定義預設的快取原則。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Net.Cache.RequestCachePolicy" /> that defines the cache policy for FTP requests.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Net.Cache.RequestCachePolicy" />，定義 FTP 要求的快取原則。

trans-unit.source: Only content received using the <xref:System.Net.WebRequestMethods.Ftp.DownloadFile> command is cached.
trans-unit.target: 使用所接收的內容<xref:System.Net.WebRequestMethods.Ftp.DownloadFile>命令會快取。

trans-unit.source: The following table describes the effects of FTP caching policies on <xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest>.
trans-unit.target: 下表描述 FTP 上快取原則的效果<xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest>。

trans-unit.source: Policy
trans-unit.target: 原則

trans-unit.source: Effect
trans-unit.target: 作用

trans-unit.source: Returns the cached resource if the resource is fresh, the content length is accurate, and the expiration, modification, and content length attributes are present.
trans-unit.target: 如果資源是新的內容長度正確無誤，，到期、 修改和內容長度屬性會，傳回快取的資源。

trans-unit.source: Returns the resource from the server.
trans-unit.target: 從伺服器傳回的資源。

trans-unit.source: Returns the cached resource if the content length is present and matches the entry size; otherwise, throws a <xref:System.Net.WebException>.
trans-unit.target: 如果內容的長度且相符的項目大小;，傳回的快取的資源否則，會擲回<xref:System.Net.WebException>。

trans-unit.source: Returns the cached resource if the content length is provided and matches the entry size; otherwise, the resource is downloaded from the server and is returned to the caller.
trans-unit.target: 如果已提供的內容長度，而相符的項目大小;，傳回的快取的資源否則，資源會從伺服器下載，並傳回給呼叫者。

trans-unit.source: Returns the cached resource if the timestamp of the cached resource is the same as the time stamp of the resource on the server; otherwise, the resource is downloaded from the server, stored in the cache, and returned to the caller.
trans-unit.target: 如果快取資源的時間戳記為相同伺服器上資源的時間戳記會傳回快取的資源否則，資源是從伺服器下載、 儲存在快取，並傳回給呼叫者。

trans-unit.source: Downloads the resource from the server, stores it in the cache, and returns the resource to the caller.
trans-unit.target: 從伺服器下載的資源、 將它儲存在快取，並傳回給呼叫端。

trans-unit.source: If a cached resource exists, it is deleted.
trans-unit.target: 如果快取的資源存在，會將其刪除。

trans-unit.source: The resource is downloaded from the server and is returned to the caller.
trans-unit.target: 資源從伺服器下載，並傳回給呼叫者。

trans-unit.source: Setting <xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.DefaultCachePolicy%2A> overrides any configuration setting.
trans-unit.target: 設定<xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.DefaultCachePolicy%2A>覆寫任何組態設定。

trans-unit.source: The caller tried to set this property to <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫端嘗試將這個屬性設為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a <see cref="T:System.Boolean" /> that specifies that an SSL connection should be used.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="T:System.Boolean" />，指定是否應使用 SSL 連線。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if control and data transmissions are encrypted; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果控制和資料傳輸已加密，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Unless the <xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.EnableSsl%2A> property is `true`, all data and commands, including your user name and password information, are sent to the server in clear text.
trans-unit.target: 除非<xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.EnableSsl%2A>屬性是`true`，所有資料和命令，包括您的使用者名稱和密碼資訊，都傳送到伺服器以純文字。

trans-unit.source: Anyone monitoring network traffic can view your credentials and use them to connect to the server.
trans-unit.target: 監視網路流量的任何人都可以檢視您的認證，並使用它們來連接到伺服器。

trans-unit.source: If you are connecting to an FTP server that requires credentials and supports SSL, you should set <xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.EnableSsl%2A> to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果您要連接到 FTP 伺服器需要認證，並支援 SSL，您應該設定<xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.EnableSsl%2A>至`true`。

trans-unit.source: The `"AUTH TLS"` command is sent to the server to request an encrypted session.
trans-unit.target: `"AUTH TLS"`命令，會要求加密的工作階段傳送至伺服器。

trans-unit.source: If the server does not recognize this command, you receive a <xref:System.Net.WebException> exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果伺服器無法辨識此命令，您會收到<xref:System.Net.WebException>例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses an encrypted connection to download the directory listing from an FTP server.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會使用加密的連線來下載的目錄清單從 FTP 伺服器。

trans-unit.source: The connection to the FTP server has already been established.
trans-unit.target: 已建立與 FTP 伺服器的連接。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" /> object that was returned when the operation started.
trans-unit.target: 作業啟動時所傳回的 <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: Ends a pending asynchronous operation started with <see cref="M:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.BeginGetRequestStream(System.AsyncCallback,System.Object)" />.
trans-unit.target: 結束由 <see cref="M:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.BeginGetRequestStream(System.AsyncCallback,System.Object)" /> 所啟動的暫止非同步作業。

trans-unit.source: A writable <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> instance associated with this instance.
trans-unit.target: 與這個執行個體關聯的可寫入 <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> 執行個體。

trans-unit.source: If the operation has not completed, the <xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.EndGetRequestStream%2A> method blocks until the operation completes.
trans-unit.target: 如果作業尚未完成，<xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.EndGetRequestStream%2A>方法會封鎖直到作業完成為止。

trans-unit.source: To determine whether the operation has completed, check the <xref:System.IAsyncResult.IsCompleted%2A> property before calling <xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.EndGetRequestStream%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要判斷是否已完成作業，請檢查<xref:System.IAsyncResult.IsCompleted%2A>屬性，然後再呼叫<xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.EndGetRequestStream%2A>。

trans-unit.source: In addition to the exceptions noted in "Exceptions," <xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.EndGetRequestStream%2A> rethrows exceptions that were thrown while opening the stream for writing.
trans-unit.target: 在 [例外狀況]，例外狀況除了<xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.EndGetRequestStream%2A>開啟供寫入資料流時所擲回的例外狀況重新擲回。

trans-unit.source: This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application.
trans-unit.target: 在應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會輸出追蹤資訊。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[網路追蹤.NET Framework 中](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates ending an asynchronous operation to get a request's stream.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例將示範如何結束非同步作業以取得要求的資料流。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest> class overview.
trans-unit.target: 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分<xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest>類別概觀。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="asyncResult" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="asyncResult" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="asyncResult" /> was not obtained by calling <see cref="M:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.BeginGetRequestStream(System.AsyncCallback,System.Object)" />.
trans-unit.target: 未呼叫 <see cref="M:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.BeginGetRequestStream(System.AsyncCallback,System.Object)" />，取得 <paramref name="asyncResult" />。

trans-unit.source: This method was already called for the operation identified by <paramref name="asyncResult" />.
trans-unit.target: 已針對 <paramref name="asyncResult" /> 所識別的作業，呼叫這個方法。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" /> that was returned when the operation started.
trans-unit.target: 作業啟動時所傳回的 <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" />。

trans-unit.source: Ends a pending asynchronous operation started with <see cref="M:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.BeginGetResponse(System.AsyncCallback,System.Object)" />.
trans-unit.target: 結束由 <see cref="M:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.BeginGetResponse(System.AsyncCallback,System.Object)" /> 所啟動的暫止非同步作業。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Net.WebResponse" /> reference that contains an <see cref="T:System.Net.FtpWebResponse" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Net.WebResponse" /> 參考，包含 <see cref="T:System.Net.FtpWebResponse" /> 執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This object contains the FTP server's response to the request.
trans-unit.target: 這個物件包含 FTP 伺服器對要求的回應。

trans-unit.source: If the operation has not completed at the time the <xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.EndGetResponse%2A> method is called, <xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.EndGetResponse%2A> blocks until the operation completes.
trans-unit.target: 如果作業尚未完成時<xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.EndGetResponse%2A>呼叫方法時，<xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.EndGetResponse%2A>封鎖直到作業完成為止。

trans-unit.source: To prevent blocking, check the <xref:System.IAsyncResult.IsCompleted%2A> property before calling <xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.EndGetResponse%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要防止封鎖，請檢查<xref:System.IAsyncResult.IsCompleted%2A>屬性，然後再呼叫<xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.EndGetResponse%2A>。

trans-unit.source: In addition to the exceptions noted in "Exceptions," <xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.EndGetResponse%2A> rethrows exceptions that were thrown while communicating with the server.
trans-unit.target: 在 [例外狀況]，例外狀況除了<xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.EndGetResponse%2A>會重新擲回與伺服器通訊時所擲回的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: An error occurred using an HTTP proxy.
trans-unit.target: 使用 HTTP Proxy 時發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: This method generates network traffic.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會產生網路流量。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the stream used to upload data to an FTP server.
trans-unit.target: 擷取用來上載資料至 FTP 伺服器的資料流。

trans-unit.source: A writable <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> instance used to store data to be sent to the server by the current request.
trans-unit.target: 可寫入的 <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> 資料流，目前的要求會用它來儲存要傳送至伺服器的資料。

trans-unit.source: Set the request properties before calling the <xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.GetRequestStream%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 設定要求的屬性，才能呼叫<xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.GetRequestStream%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: After writing the data to the stream, you must close the stream prior to sending the request.
trans-unit.target: 之後將資料寫入資料流中，您必須關閉再傳送要求資料流。

trans-unit.source: If you have not set the <xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.Method%2A> property to <xref:System.Net.WebRequestMethods.Ftp.UploadFile> or <xref:System.Net.WebRequestMethods.Ftp.AppendFile>, you cannot get the stream.
trans-unit.target: 如果您沒有設定<xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.Method%2A>屬性<xref:System.Net.WebRequestMethods.Ftp.UploadFile>或<xref:System.Net.WebRequestMethods.Ftp.AppendFile>，您無法取得資料流。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.GetRequestStream%2A> blocks while waiting for the stream.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.GetRequestStream%2A> 等候資料流的區塊。

trans-unit.source: To prevent this, call the <xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.BeginGetRequestStream%2A> method in place of <xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.GetRequestStream%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要避免此狀況，呼叫<xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.BeginGetRequestStream%2A>方法取代<xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.GetRequestStream%2A>。

trans-unit.source: This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md).

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates copying a file to a request's data stream and sending a request to the server to upload the data and append it to a file.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何將檔案複製到要求的資料流，並將要求傳送至伺服器，以將資料上傳，並將其附加至檔案。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="M:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.BeginGetRequestStream(System.AsyncCallback,System.Object)" /> has been called and has not completed.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.BeginGetRequestStream(System.AsyncCallback,System.Object)" /> 已呼叫，但尚未完成。

trans-unit.source: \- or -

An HTTP proxy is enabled, and you attempted to use an FTP command other than <see cref="F:System.Net.WebRequestMethods.Ftp.DownloadFile" />, <see cref="F:System.Net.WebRequestMethods.Ftp.ListDirectory" />, or <see cref="F:System.Net.WebRequestMethods.Ftp.ListDirectoryDetails" />.
trans-unit.target: HTTP Proxy 已啟用，但您嘗試使用 <see cref="F:System.Net.WebRequestMethods.Ftp.DownloadFile" />、<see cref="F:System.Net.WebRequestMethods.Ftp.ListDirectory" /> 或 <see cref="F:System.Net.WebRequestMethods.Ftp.ListDirectoryDetails" /> 以外的 FTP 命令。

trans-unit.source: A connection to the FTP server could not be established.
trans-unit.target: 無法建立與 FTP 伺服器的連接。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.Method" /> property is not set to <see cref="F:System.Net.WebRequestMethods.Ftp.UploadFile" /> or <see cref="F:System.Net.WebRequestMethods.Ftp.AppendFile" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.Method" /> 屬性未設定為 <see cref="F:System.Net.WebRequestMethods.Ftp.UploadFile" /> 或 <see cref="F:System.Net.WebRequestMethods.Ftp.AppendFile" />。

trans-unit.source: This method generates network traffic.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會產生網路流量。

trans-unit.source: Returns the FTP server response.
trans-unit.target: 傳回 FTP 伺服器回應。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Net.WebResponse" /> reference that contains an <see cref="T:System.Net.FtpWebResponse" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Net.WebResponse" /> 參考，包含 <see cref="T:System.Net.FtpWebResponse" /> 執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This object contains the FTP server's response to the request.
trans-unit.target: 這個物件包含 FTP 伺服器對要求的回應。

trans-unit.source: To access the FTP-specific properties, you must cast the <xref:System.Net.WebResponse> object returned by this method to <xref:System.Net.FtpWebResponse>.
trans-unit.target: 若要存取的 FTP 特定屬性，您必須轉換<xref:System.Net.WebResponse>至這個方法所傳回的物件<xref:System.Net.FtpWebResponse>。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.GetResponse%2A> causes a control connection to be established, and might also create a data connection.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.GetResponse%2A> 會導致建立，控制連接可能也會建立資料連接。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.GetResponse%2A> blocks until the response is received.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.GetResponse%2A> 封鎖直到收到的回應。

trans-unit.source: To prevent this, you can perform this operation asynchronously by calling the <xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.BeginGetResponse%2A> and <xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.EndGetResponse%2A> methods in place of <xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.GetResponse%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要避免這個問題，您可以執行這項作業以非同步方式呼叫<xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.BeginGetResponse%2A>和<xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.EndGetResponse%2A>方法，取代<xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.GetResponse%2A>。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.Proxy%2A> property is set, either directly or in a configuration file, communications with the FTP server are made through the proxy.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.Proxy%2A>屬性設定，可能是直接或組態檔中，與 FTP 伺服器通訊都會經過 proxy。

trans-unit.source: If a <xref:System.Net.WebException> is thrown, use the <xref:System.Net.WebException.Response%2A> and <xref:System.Net.WebException.Status%2A> properties of the exception to determine the response from the server.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Net.WebException>會擲回，使用<xref:System.Net.WebException.Response%2A>和<xref:System.Net.WebException.Status%2A>屬性來判斷伺服器的回應例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application.
trans-unit.target: 在應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會輸出追蹤資訊。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[網路追蹤.NET Framework 中](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。

trans-unit.source: Multiple calls to <xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.GetResponse%2A> return the same response object; the request is not reissued.
trans-unit.target: 多個呼叫<xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.GetResponse%2A>傳回相同的回應物件; 不會重新發出要求。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates copying a file to a request's data stream and sending a request to append data to a file to the server.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何將檔案複製到要求的資料流，並傳送要求，以將資料附加到檔案伺服器。

trans-unit.source: The example calls <xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.GetResponse%2A> to send the request and block until the response is returned by the server.
trans-unit.target: 範例會呼叫<xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.GetResponse%2A>傳送要求，並封鎖，直到伺服器所傳回的回應。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="M:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.GetResponse" /> or <see cref="M:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.BeginGetResponse(System.AsyncCallback,System.Object)" /> has already been called for this instance.
trans-unit.target: 針對這個執行個體，已經呼叫 <see cref="M:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.GetResponse" /> 或 <see cref="M:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.BeginGetResponse(System.AsyncCallback,System.Object)" />。

trans-unit.source: \- or -

An HTTP proxy is enabled, and you attempted to use an FTP command other than <see cref="F:System.Net.WebRequestMethods.Ftp.DownloadFile" />, <see cref="F:System.Net.WebRequestMethods.Ftp.ListDirectory" />, or <see cref="F:System.Net.WebRequestMethods.Ftp.ListDirectoryDetails" />.
trans-unit.target: HTTP Proxy 已啟用，但您嘗試使用 <see cref="F:System.Net.WebRequestMethods.Ftp.DownloadFile" />、<see cref="F:System.Net.WebRequestMethods.Ftp.ListDirectory" /> 或 <see cref="F:System.Net.WebRequestMethods.Ftp.ListDirectoryDetails" /> 以外的 FTP 命令。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="P:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.EnableSsl" /> is set to <see langword="true" />, but the server does not support this feature.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.EnableSsl" /> 設為 <see langword="true" />，但伺服器不支援這項功能。

trans-unit.source: \- or -
A <see cref="P:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.Timeout" /> was specified and the timeout has expired.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.Timeout" /> 已指定且已經逾時。

trans-unit.source: This method generates network traffic.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會產生網路流量。

trans-unit.source: Gets an empty <see cref="T:System.Net.WebHeaderCollection" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 取得空的 <see cref="T:System.Net.WebHeaderCollection" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: An empty <see cref="T:System.Net.WebHeaderCollection" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 空的 <see cref="T:System.Net.WebHeaderCollection" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.Headers%2A> property is provided only for compatibility with other implementations of the <xref:System.Net.WebRequest> and <xref:System.Net.WebResponse> classes.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.Headers%2A>屬性僅供使用的其他實作相容性<xref:System.Net.WebRequest>和<xref:System.Net.WebResponse>類別。

trans-unit.source: There is no reason to use <xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.Headers%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 沒有理由来使用<xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.Headers%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a <see cref="T:System.Boolean" /> value that specifies whether the control connection to the FTP server is closed after the request completes.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="T:System.Boolean" /> 值，指定在要求完成之後，與 FTP 伺服器的控制連接是否關閉。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the connection to the server should not be destroyed; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果與伺服器的連接不應終結，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.KeepAlive%2A> property is set to `false`, the control connection is closed when you call the <xref:System.Net.FtpWebResponse.Close%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.KeepAlive%2A>屬性設定為`false`，當您呼叫關閉控制連接<xref:System.Net.FtpWebResponse.Close%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Changing <xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.KeepAlive%2A> after calling the <xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.GetRequestStream%2A>, <xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.BeginGetRequestStream%2A>, <xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.GetResponse%2A>, or <xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.BeginGetResponse%2A> method causes an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> exception.
trans-unit.target: 變更<xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.KeepAlive%2A>之後呼叫<xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.GetRequestStream%2A>， <xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.BeginGetRequestStream%2A>， <xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.GetResponse%2A>，或<xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.BeginGetResponse%2A>方法會使<xref:System.InvalidOperationException>例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: The following code example retrieves and displays property values for a specified <xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest> object.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例擷取並顯示針對指定的屬性值<xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest>物件。

trans-unit.source: A new value was specified for this property for a request that is already in progress.
trans-unit.target: 由於已經在進行的要求，已為這個屬性指定新的值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the command to send to the FTP server.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定要傳送至 FTP 伺服器的命令。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> value that contains the FTP command to send to the server.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.String" /> 值，包含要傳送至伺服器的 FTP 命令。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see cref="F:System.Net.WebRequestMethods.Ftp.DownloadFile" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是 <see cref="F:System.Net.WebRequestMethods.Ftp.DownloadFile" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.Method%2A> property determines which command is sent to the server.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.Method%2A>屬性會決定哪一個命令傳送到伺服器。

trans-unit.source: You set the <xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.Method%2A> by using the strings defined in the public field members of the <xref:System.Net.WebRequestMethods.Ftp> class.
trans-unit.target: 您設定<xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.Method%2A>藉由使用中的公用欄位成員定義的字串<xref:System.Net.WebRequestMethods.Ftp>類別。

trans-unit.source: Note that the strings defined in the <xref:System.Net.WebRequestMethods.Ftp> class are the only supported options for the <xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.Method%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，在中定義的字串<xref:System.Net.WebRequestMethods.Ftp>類別是唯一支援的選項為<xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.Method%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Setting the <xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.Method%2A> property to any other value will result in an <xref:System.ArgumentException> exception.
trans-unit.target: 設定<xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.Method%2A>為任何其他值的屬性會導致<xref:System.ArgumentException>例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: When setting <xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.Method%2A> to <xref:System.Net.WebRequestMethods.Ftp.UploadFile>, you must do so before calling the <xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.GetRequestStream%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 設定時<xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.Method%2A>至<xref:System.Net.WebRequestMethods.Ftp.UploadFile>，您必須先呼叫執行<xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.GetRequestStream%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Failure to call these members in the correct order causes a <xref:System.Net.ProtocolViolationException> exception when you attempt to get the request stream.
trans-unit.target: 無法呼叫正確的順序會導致這些成員<xref:System.Net.ProtocolViolationException>例外狀況，當您嘗試取得要求資料流。

trans-unit.source: The credentials supplied for the <xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest> object must have permission to perform the specified method.
trans-unit.target: 認證提供給<xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest>物件必須具有權限可以執行指定的方法。

trans-unit.source: If not, the FTP command fails.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有，則 FTP 命令會失敗。

trans-unit.source: To determine the success or failure of a command, check the <xref:System.Net.FtpWebResponse.StatusCode%2A> and <xref:System.Net.FtpWebResponse.StatusDescription%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 若要判斷成功或失敗的命令，檢查<xref:System.Net.FtpWebResponse.StatusCode%2A>和<xref:System.Net.FtpWebResponse.StatusDescription%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example sets this property to <xref:System.Net.WebRequestMethods.Ftp.DeleteFile>.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會將此屬性設定為<xref:System.Net.WebRequestMethods.Ftp.DeleteFile>。

trans-unit.source: A new value was specified for this property for a request that is already in progress.
trans-unit.target: 由於已經在進行的要求，已為這個屬性指定新的值。

trans-unit.source: The method is invalid.
trans-unit.target: 此方法無效。

trans-unit.source: \- or -
The method is not supported.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法不受支援。

trans-unit.source: \- or -
Multiple methods were specified.
trans-unit.target: 指定多個方法。

trans-unit.source: Always throws a <see cref="T:System.NotSupportedException" />.
trans-unit.target: 永遠擲回 <see cref="T:System.NotSupportedException" />。

trans-unit.source: Always throws a <see cref="T:System.NotSupportedException" />.
trans-unit.target: 永遠擲回 <see cref="T:System.NotSupportedException" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.PreAuthenticate%2A> property is provided only for compatibility with other implementations of the <xref:System.Net.WebRequest> and <xref:System.Net.WebResponse> classes.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.PreAuthenticate%2A>屬性僅供使用的其他實作相容性<xref:System.Net.WebRequest>和<xref:System.Net.WebResponse>類別。

trans-unit.source: Preauthentication is not supported for FTP.
trans-unit.target: FTP 不支援預先驗證。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the proxy used to communicate with the FTP server.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定用來與 FTP 伺服器通訊的 Proxy。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Net.IWebProxy" /> instance responsible for communicating with the FTP server.
trans-unit.target: 負責與 FTP 伺服器通訊的 <see cref="T:System.Net.IWebProxy" /> 執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.Proxy%2A> property identifies the <xref:System.Net.IWebProxy> instance that communicates with the FTP server.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.Proxy%2A>屬性會識別<xref:System.Net.IWebProxy>與 FTP 伺服器通訊的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The proxy is set by the system by using configuration files and the Internet Explorer Local Area Network settings.
trans-unit.target: Proxy 是由系統設定使用組態檔和 Internet Explorer 區域網路設定。

trans-unit.source: To specify that no proxy should be used, set <xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.Proxy%2A> to the proxy instance returned by the <xref:System.Net.GlobalProxySelection.GetEmptyWebProxy%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 指定應沒有任何 proxy，請設定<xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.Proxy%2A>proxy 執行個體所傳回<xref:System.Net.GlobalProxySelection.GetEmptyWebProxy%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: For more information about automatic proxy detection, see [Automatic Proxy Detection](~/docs/framework/network-programming/automatic-proxy-detection.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需自動 proxy 偵測的詳細資訊，請參閱[自動 Proxy 偵測](~/docs/framework/network-programming/automatic-proxy-detection.md)。

trans-unit.source: You must set <xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.Proxy%2A> before writing data to the request's stream or getting the response.
trans-unit.target: 您必須設定<xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.Proxy%2A>之前寫入要求資料流的資料，或取得回應。

trans-unit.source: Changing <xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.Proxy%2A> after calling the <xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.GetRequestStream%2A>, <xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.BeginGetRequestStream%2A>, <xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.GetResponse%2A>, or <xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.BeginGetResponse%2A> method causes an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> exception.
trans-unit.target: 變更<xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.Proxy%2A>之後呼叫<xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.GetRequestStream%2A>， <xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.BeginGetRequestStream%2A>， <xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.GetResponse%2A>，或<xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.BeginGetResponse%2A>方法會使<xref:System.InvalidOperationException>例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest> class supports HTTP and ISA Firewall Client proxies.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest>類別支援 HTTP 和 ISA 防火牆用戶端 proxy。

trans-unit.source: If the specified proxy is an HTTP proxy, only the <xref:System.Net.WebRequestMethods.Ftp.DownloadFile>, <xref:System.Net.WebRequestMethods.Ftp.ListDirectory>, and <xref:System.Net.WebRequestMethods.Ftp.ListDirectoryDetails> commands are supported.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的 proxy，則 HTTP proxy，僅<xref:System.Net.WebRequestMethods.Ftp.DownloadFile>， <xref:System.Net.WebRequestMethods.Ftp.ListDirectory>，和<xref:System.Net.WebRequestMethods.Ftp.ListDirectoryDetails>支援命令。

trans-unit.source: The following code example displays this property value.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會顯示這個屬性值。

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be set to <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性不可設為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: A new value was specified for this property for a request that is already in progress.
trans-unit.target: 由於已經在進行的要求，已為這個屬性指定新的值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a time-out when reading from or writing to a stream.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定讀取或寫入資料流的逾時。

trans-unit.source: The number of milliseconds before the reading or writing times out. The default value is 300,000 milliseconds (5 minutes).
trans-unit.target: 讀取或寫入逾時前的毫秒數。預設值為 300,000 毫秒 (5 分鐘)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.ReadWriteTimeout%2A> is used when writing to the stream returned by the <xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.GetRequestStream%2A> method or reading from the stream returned by the <xref:System.Net.FtpWebResponse.GetResponseStream%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.ReadWriteTimeout%2A>寫入至所傳回的資料流時使用<xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.GetRequestStream%2A>方法或從傳回的資料流讀取<xref:System.Net.FtpWebResponse.GetResponseStream%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Specifically, the <xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.ReadWriteTimeout%2A> property controls the time-out for the <xref:System.IO.Stream.Read%2A> method, which is used to read the stream returned by the <xref:System.Net.FtpWebResponse.GetResponseStream%2A> method, and for the <xref:System.IO.Stream.Write%2A> method, which is used to write to the stream returned by the <xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.GetRequestStream%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 具體來說，<xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.ReadWriteTimeout%2A>屬性控制的逾時值<xref:System.IO.Stream.Read%2A>方法，用來讀取傳回之資料流<xref:System.Net.FtpWebResponse.GetResponseStream%2A>方法，以及<xref:System.IO.Stream.Write%2A>方法，用來寫入資料流傳回<xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.GetRequestStream%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: If the time-out period is exceeded, the calling method throws a <xref:System.Net.WebException> with <xref:System.Net.WebExceptionStatus> set to <xref:System.Net.WebExceptionStatus.Timeout>.
trans-unit.target: 如果超過逾時期限時，呼叫的方法會擲回<xref:System.Net.WebException>與<xref:System.Net.WebExceptionStatus>設<xref:System.Net.WebExceptionStatus.Timeout>。

trans-unit.source: To specify the amount of time to wait for the request to complete, use the <xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.Timeout%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要指定要完成之要求的等待時間，請使用<xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.Timeout%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The request has already been sent.
trans-unit.target: 已傳送此要求。

trans-unit.source: The value specified for a set operation is less than or equal to zero and is not equal to <see cref="F:System.Threading.Timeout.Infinite" />.
trans-unit.target: 指定給設定作業的值小於或等於零，並且不等於 <see cref="F:System.Threading.Timeout.Infinite" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the new name of a file being renamed.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定重新命名檔案的新名稱。

trans-unit.source: The new name of the file being renamed.
trans-unit.target: 要重新命名之檔案的新名稱。

trans-unit.source: The value specified for a set operation is <see langword="null" /> or an empty string.
trans-unit.target: 為設定作業所指定的值為 <see langword="null" /> 或空字串。

trans-unit.source: A new value was specified for this property for a request that is already in progress.
trans-unit.target: 由於已經在進行的要求，已為這個屬性指定新的值。

trans-unit.source: Gets the URI requested by this instance.
trans-unit.target: 取得這個執行個體所要求的 URI。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> instance that identifies a resource that is accessed using the File Transfer Protocol.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> 執行個體，識別使用檔案傳輸通訊協定所存取的資源。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.RequestUri%2A> property is the URI specified when the <xref:System.Net.WebRequest.Create%2A> method was called to obtain this instance.
trans-unit.target: 值<xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.RequestUri%2A>屬性是 URI 時指定<xref:System.Net.WebRequest.Create%2A>方法呼叫來取得這個執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The following code example displays this property value.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會顯示這個屬性值。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Net.ServicePoint" /> object used to connect to the FTP server.
trans-unit.target: 取得用來連接到 FTP 伺服器的 <see cref="T:System.Net.ServicePoint" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Net.ServicePoint" /> object that can be used to customize connection behavior.
trans-unit.target: 可以用來自訂連接行為的 <see cref="T:System.Net.ServicePoint" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: If no <xref:System.Net.ServicePoint> object exists, one is created for the FTP server.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有<xref:System.Net.ServicePoint>物件存在，便會建立一個 FTP 伺服器。

trans-unit.source: To set the maximum number of connections that can be open for an FTP server, set the <xref:System.Net.ServicePoint.ConnectionLimit%2A> property of the <xref:System.Net.ServicePoint> instance returned by this property.
trans-unit.target: 若要設定的開啟 FTP 伺服器的連線數目上限，設定<xref:System.Net.ServicePoint.ConnectionLimit%2A>屬性<xref:System.Net.ServicePoint>這個屬性所傳回的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The following code example retrieves the service point from a request and sets the maximum number of connections to one.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會擷取要求的服務點和其中一個設定的連線數目上限。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the number of milliseconds to wait for a request.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定等待要求的毫秒數。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> value that contains the number of milliseconds to wait before a request times out. The default value is <see cref="F:System.Threading.Timeout.Infinite" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> 值，包含要求逾時之前等待的毫秒數。預設值是 <see cref="F:System.Threading.Timeout.Infinite" />。

trans-unit.source: To specify an infinite value, set the <xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.Timeout%2A> property to <xref:System.Threading.Timeout.Infinite> (-1).
trans-unit.target: 若要指定無限值，設定<xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.Timeout%2A>屬性<xref:System.Threading.Timeout.Infinite>(-1)。

trans-unit.source: This is the default value.
trans-unit.target: 這是預設值。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.Timeout%2A> is the number of milliseconds that a synchronous request made with the <xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.GetResponse%2A> method waits for a response and that the <xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.GetRequestStream%2A> method waits for a stream.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.Timeout%2A> 會提出同步要求的毫秒數<xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.GetResponse%2A>方法會等候回應且<xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.GetRequestStream%2A>方法會等候資料流。

trans-unit.source: If a resource does not respond within the time-out period, the request throws a <xref:System.Net.WebException> with the <xref:System.Net.WebException.Status%2A> property set to <xref:System.Net.WebExceptionStatus.Timeout>.
trans-unit.target: 如果資源不會逾時期限之內回應，要求會擲回<xref:System.Net.WebException>與<xref:System.Net.WebException.Status%2A>屬性設定為<xref:System.Net.WebExceptionStatus.Timeout>。

trans-unit.source: Changing <xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.Timeout%2A> after calling the <xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.GetRequestStream%2A>, <xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.BeginGetRequestStream%2A>, <xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.GetResponse%2A>, or <xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.BeginGetResponse%2A> method causes an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> exception.
trans-unit.target: 變更<xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.Timeout%2A>之後呼叫<xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.GetRequestStream%2A>， <xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.BeginGetRequestStream%2A>， <xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.GetResponse%2A>，或<xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.BeginGetResponse%2A>方法會使<xref:System.InvalidOperationException>例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: A Domain Name System (DNS) query may take up to 15 seconds to return or time out. If your request contains a host name that requires resolution and you set <xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.Timeout%2A> to a value less than 15 seconds, it may take 15 seconds or more before a <xref:System.Net.WebException> is thrown to indicate a time-out on your request.
trans-unit.target: 最多為 15 秒才傳回或逾時，可能需要網域名稱系統 (DNS) 查詢。如果您的要求包含需要解析主機名稱，而且設定<xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.Timeout%2A>的值小於 15 秒，可能需要 15 秒以上才能<xref:System.Net.WebException>就會擲回，表示您的要求逾時。

trans-unit.source: The following code example sets this property.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會設定這個屬性。

trans-unit.source: The value specified is less than zero and is not <see cref="F:System.Threading.Timeout.Infinite" />.
trans-unit.target: 指定的值小於零，而且不是 <see cref="F:System.Threading.Timeout.Infinite" />。

trans-unit.source: A new value was specified for this property for a request that is already in progress.
trans-unit.target: 由於已經在進行的要求，已為這個屬性指定新的值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a <see cref="T:System.Boolean" /> value that specifies the data type for file transfers.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="T:System.Boolean" /> 值，指定檔案傳輸的資料型別。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to indicate to the server that the data to be transferred is binary; <see langword="false" /> to indicate that the data is text.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 向伺服器表示，要傳輸的資料是二進位資料； <see langword="false" /> 則表示資料是文字。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: If you are sending binary data, such as an image, set this property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果您要傳送二進位資料，例如影像，會將此屬性設定為`true`。

trans-unit.source: If you are sending text, set the property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果您要傳送的文字，將屬性設定為`false`。

trans-unit.source: Specifying `true` causes the <xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest> to send a `"TYPE I"` command to the server.
trans-unit.target: 指定`true`導致<xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest>傳送`"TYPE I"`命令至伺服器。

trans-unit.source: Specifying `false` causes the <xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest> to send a `"Type A"` command to the server.
trans-unit.target: 指定`false`導致<xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest>傳送`"Type A"`命令至伺服器。

trans-unit.source: FTP servers can ignore these commands.
trans-unit.target: FTP 伺服器可以忽略這些命令。

trans-unit.source: Changing <xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.UseBinary%2A> after calling the <xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.GetRequestStream%2A>, <xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.BeginGetRequestStream%2A>, <xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.GetResponse%2A>, or <xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.BeginGetResponse%2A> method causes an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> exception.
trans-unit.target: 變更<xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.UseBinary%2A>之後呼叫<xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.GetRequestStream%2A>， <xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.BeginGetRequestStream%2A>， <xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.GetResponse%2A>，或<xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.BeginGetResponse%2A>方法會使<xref:System.InvalidOperationException>例外狀況。

trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例擷取並顯示針對指定的屬性值<xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest>物件。

trans-unit.source: A new value was specified for this property for a request that is already in progress.
trans-unit.target: 由於已經在進行的要求，已為這個屬性指定新的值。

trans-unit.source: Always throws a <see cref="T:System.NotSupportedException" />.
trans-unit.target: 永遠擲回 <see cref="T:System.NotSupportedException" />。

trans-unit.source: Always throws a <see cref="T:System.NotSupportedException" />.
trans-unit.target: 永遠擲回 <see cref="T:System.NotSupportedException" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.UseDefaultCredentials%2A> property is provided only for compatibility with other implementations of the <xref:System.Net.WebRequest> and <xref:System.Net.WebResponse> classes.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.UseDefaultCredentials%2A>屬性僅供使用的其他實作相容性<xref:System.Net.WebRequest>和<xref:System.Net.WebResponse>類別。

trans-unit.source: There is no reason to use <xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.UseDefaultCredentials%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 沒有理由来使用<xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.UseDefaultCredentials%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Default credentials are not supported for FTP.
trans-unit.target: FTP 不支援預設認證。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the behavior of a client application's data transfer process.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定用戶端應用程式之資料傳輸處理序的行為。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="false" /> if the client application's data transfer process listens for a connection on the data port; otherwise, <see langword="true" /> if the client should initiate a connection on the data port.
trans-unit.target: 如果用戶端應用程式的資料傳輸處理序會接聽資料連接埠上的連接，則為 <see langword="false" />；如果用戶端應該在資料連接埠上啟始連接，則為 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: Setting the <xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.UsePassive%2A> property to `true` sends the "`PASV"` command to the server.
trans-unit.target: 設定<xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.UsePassive%2A>屬性`true`傳送 「`PASV"`命令至伺服器。

trans-unit.source: This command requests the server to listen on a data port and to wait for a connection rather than initiate one upon receipt of a transfer command.
trans-unit.target: 此命令會要求伺服器資料連接埠上接聽，等候連接，而不是啟始接收傳輸命令時。

trans-unit.source: For a description of the behaviors that are specified using <xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.UsePassive%2A>, see RFC 959, "File Transfer Protocol," Section 3.2, "Establishing Data Connections" and Section 4.1.2, "Transfer Parameter Commands," available at [http://www.rfc-editor.org/](http://www.ietf.org/rfc/rfc959.txt).
trans-unit.target: 如需使用指定的行為的說明<xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.UsePassive%2A>，請參閱 RFC 959，「 檔案傳輸通訊協定，」 一節 3.2、 [建立資料連線] 和區段 4.1.2，」 傳送參數可用的命令，「 在[ http://www.rfc-editor.org/ ](http://www.ietf.org/rfc/rfc959.txt).

trans-unit.source: Changing <xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.UsePassive%2A> after calling the <xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.GetRequestStream%2A>, <xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.BeginGetRequestStream%2A>, <xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.GetResponse%2A>, or <xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.BeginGetResponse%2A> method causes an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> exception.
trans-unit.target: 變更<xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.UsePassive%2A>之後呼叫<xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.GetRequestStream%2A>， <xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.BeginGetRequestStream%2A>， <xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.GetResponse%2A>，或<xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.BeginGetResponse%2A>方法會使<xref:System.InvalidOperationException>例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.UsePassive%2A> is set to `true`, the FTP server may not send the size of the file, and download progress can always be zero.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.UsePassive%2A>設`true`、 FTP 伺服器可能不會傳送檔案的大小和下載進度可以永遠是零。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.UsePassive%2A> is set to `false`, a firewall can raise an alert and block the file download.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.UsePassive%2A>設`false`，防火牆可以引發警示，並封鎖檔案下載。

trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例擷取並顯示針對指定的屬性值<xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest>物件。

trans-unit.target: 由於已經在進行的要求，已為這個屬性指定新的值。
